title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.3 - Subject matter list, location and time for inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 461.3 - Subject matter list, location and time for inspection

State Regulations
(a) Subject matter list. Categories of
records and locations of regional offices are listed at
http://www.nysparks.state.ny.us/inside-our-agency/foil-requests.aspx. (b) Locations. (1)

If access is granted records shall be
available for inspection upon request and appointment during regular business
hours at OPRHP's Albany office, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233. Alternatively, the Records Access Officer may make records available for inspection at a
regional office or at the State Historic Preservation Office at Peebles Island

Resource Center, Delaware Avenue, Cohoes, NY 12047, Telephone No. (518)
2378643. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
461.3

Amended

New

York State Register March 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 10, eff. 3/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
